products.name: Children's Savings Account
products.description: Our Children's Savings Account rewards you with bonus interest each month that you make a deposit (of any amount) and no withdrawals. Aimed to help teach children the benefits of regular saving. Available to all members under 18 years of age.

products.name: Discounted Variable Rate Home Loan
products.description: Our Discounted Variable Rate Home Loan is a great choice if you’re a budget-conscious borrower on the lookout for something simple, but effective, that won’t charge you extra if you want to repay it faster (and save heaps in the process).

products.name: Bridging Home Loan
products.description: Our Bridging Home Loan allows you to purchase a new Owner Occupied property before selling your current home - taking a lot of the stress out of the process. You can choose to make monthly interest only repayments or you can have the interest added  (capitalised) to your loan during the bridging period.  Nil-end debt loans are not available for non-members (members for less than 12 months) where the end debt is less thant $300,000.

products.name: 1-Year Fixed Home Loan Package
products.description: Our 1 year Fixed Home Loan Package is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees. The Credit Union SA Fixed Home Loan Package offers a fantastic collection of benefits across our Home Loans, Visa Credit Card, Personal Loans, Term Deposits and more.  You pay an annual fee of $395 and in return you’ll save an absolute bundle.

products.name: 3-Year Fixed Rate Home Loan
products.description: Our 3 year Fixed Rate Home Loan is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees.

products.name: 1-Year Fixed Rate Home Loan
products.description: Our 1 year Fixed Rate Home Loan is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees.

products.name: 2-Year Fixed Rate Home Loan
products.description: Our 2 year Fixed Rate Home Loan is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees.

products.name: Tesla Powerwall Loan
products.description: Our Tesla Powerwall Loan is available for non-members and members seeking to purchase a Tesla Powerwall and upgrade or purchase associated solar panels. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 5 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for consumer purpose.

products.name: Variable Home Loan Package <70% Special
products.description: Our Variable Home Loan Package is ideal for those seeking significant flexibility. The Credit Union SA Variable Home Loan Package offers a fantastic collection of benefits across our Home Loans, Visa Credit Card, Personal Loans, Term Deposits and more.  You pay an annual fee of $395 and in return you’ll save an absolute bundle.

products.name: Standard Variable Rate Home Loan
products.description: Our Standard Variable Rate Home Loan is ideal for those seeking significant flexibility – a rate that moves with the market and many convenient features to help you pay off your loan sooner.

products.name: 3-Year Fixed Home Loan Package
products.description: Our 3 year Fixed Home Loan Package is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees. The Credit Union SA Fixed Home Loan Package offers a fantastic collection of benefits across our Home Loans, Visa Credit Card, Personal Loans, Term Deposits and more.  You pay an annual fee of $395 and in return you’ll save an absolute bundle.

products.name: 2-Year Fixed Home Loan Package
products.description: Our 2 year Fixed Home Loan Package is perfect if you have a strict budget as you’ll know exactly what your repayments will be. Plus you pay no monthly or redraw fees. The Credit Union SA Fixed Home Loan Package offers a fantastic collection of benefits across our Home Loans, Visa Credit Card, Personal Loans, Term Deposits and more.  You pay an annual fee of $395 and in return you’ll save an absolute bundle.

products.name: Variable Home Loan Package
products.description: Our Variable Home Loan Package is ideal for those seeking significant flexibility. The Credit Union SA Variable Home Loan Package offers a fantastic collection of benefits across our Home Loans, Visa Credit Card, Personal Loans, Term Deposits and more.  You pay an annual fee of $395 and in return you’ll save an absolute bundle.

products.name: 55+ Account
products.description: Our 55+ transaction account is available to all members aged 55 and over. It offers you the ability to earn higher returns without having to lock funds away and has no monthly account keeping or transaction fees. Visa debit cards can be linked to this account.

products.name: Netsave Account
products.description: Our Netsave account offers you interest regardless of your account balance. Interest is calculated daily and paid monthly, with funds at call. Earn a high introductory variable interest rate for 4 months on balances up to $1 million for new Netsave Accounts. Available to all members.

products.name: Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan is available  when secured by a new or used vehicle aged 5 years and less. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Education Community Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Education Community Fixed Rate Personal Loan is available to any employee that works in the education community and students carrying out studies in education and eligible family members (these are parents, children, grandparents, grandchildren, siblings and partners only), as part of the Education Community Banking Benefits offered by Credit Union SA. This product is available secured by a vehicle aged 10 years and less. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Education Community Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Education Community Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan is available to any employee that works in the education community and students carrying out studies in education and eligible family members (these are parents, children, grandparents, grandchildren, siblings and partners only), as part of the Education Community Banking Benefits offered by Credit Union SA. This product is available when secured by a new or used vehicle aged 5 years and less The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Online-only Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our online-only Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan rate is available just for applications received through our digital channels. This product is available when secured by a new or used vehicle aged 5 years and less. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Education Community online-only Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Education Community online-only Special Fixed Rate Personal Loan is available to any employee that works in the education community and students carrying out studies in education and eligible family members (these are parents, children, grandparents, grandchildren, siblings and partners only), as part of the Education Community Banking Benefits offered by Credit Union SA. This product is available just for applications received through our digital channels when secured by a new or used vehicle aged 5 years and less. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Fixed Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Fixed Rate Personal Loan is available when secured by a vehicle aged 10 years and less. The minimum loan amount is $5,000. The interest rate of this product is fixed for the life of the loan up to a maximum of 7 years. Principal and interest repayments. Available for any consumer purpose.

products.name: Term Deposit
products.description: Term Deposits offer a high, fixed rate of interest, calculated daily and paid at maturity for terms up to 12 months. While for terms of one to five years, interest can be paid fortnightly, monthly, quarterly or annually. This product is available to all members.

products.name: Bonus Savings Account
products.description: Our Bonus Savings Account rewards you with bonus interest each month that you make a deposit (of any amount) and no withdrawals. Available to all members.

products.name: Education Community Credit Card
products.description: Our Education Community Credit Card includes no annual fee, a 0% pa introductory rate for the first six months on purchases, balance transfers and cash advances as well as a low ongoing interest rate after the first 6 months.  You’ll have the ability to make fast payments with Google Pay, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Visa payWave. It’s also highly secure, with microchip technology, 24/7 fraud monitoring, Visa’s Zero Liability policy and Visa Secure for online purchases from participating merchants and payWave. You’ll also be able to temporarily lock your card (if you misplace it), plus block payWave, international and online transactions whenever you need to – using the Mobile Banking App or Internet Banking.

products.name: Visa Credit Card
products.description: Our Visa Credit Card offers 6 months of 0% pa on balance transfers. Afterwards you’ll still enjoy a low ongoing interest rate, with the same low rate applying for all purchases and cash advances. You’ll have the ability to make fast payments with Google Pay, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Visa payWave. It’s also highly secure, with microchip technology, 24/7 fraud monitoring, Visa’s Zero Liability policy and Visa Secure for online purchases from participating merchants and payWave. You’ll also be able to temporarily lock your card (if you misplace it), plus block payWave, international and online transactions whenever you need to – using the Mobile Banking App or Internet Banking.

products.name: Workplace Benefits Credit Card
products.description: Our Workplace Benefits Credit Card includes no annual fee, a 0% pa introductory rate for the first six months on purchases, balance transfers and cash advances as well as a low ongoing interest rate after the first 6 months.  You’ll have the ability to make fast payments with Google Pay, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Visa payWave. It’s also highly secure, with microchip technology, 24/7 fraud monitoring, Visa’s Zero Liability policy and Visa Secure for online purchases from participating merchants and payWave. You’ll also be able to temporarily lock your card (if you misplace it), plus block payWave, international and online transactions whenever you need to – using the Mobile Banking App or Internet Banking.

products.name: Education Community Variable Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Education Community Variable Rate Personal Loan is available to any employee that works in the education community and students carrying out studies in education and eligible family members (these are parents, children, grandparents, grandchildren, siblings and partners only), as part of the Education Community Banking Benefits offered by Credit Union SA. It is an unsecured personal loan. The minimum loan amount is $5,000 and a maximum loan amount of $50,000.

products.name: Association Account
products.description: Our Association Account is an affordable and convenient interest-bearing transaction account designed for not-for-profit organisations of any type. Visa debit cards can be linked to this account.

products.name: Access Account
products.description: Our Access Account is a free of transaction fees account without monthly fees. Free Visa debit card is provided with payWave. This card can be loaded into Google Pay™, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay and Garmin Pay™. Purchases can be made using an smart device, wherever mobile payment systems are offered. Card is accepted at over 10,000 fee-free ATMs around Australia.  Visa Zero Liability policy (which protects against unauthorised transactions) and our 24/7 fraud monitoring service. Online banking is available 24/7 with Internet Banking and our Mobile Banking App. Available to all members.

products.name: Home Loan Offset Account
products.description: Our Home Loan Offset Account offers all the convenient day-to-day banking features you need, but with the huge added advantage of also lowering the amount of interest you pay on your eligible variable rate home loan. Visa debit cards can be linked to this account.

products.name: Variable Rate Personal Loan
products.description: Our Variable Rate Personal Loan is an unsecured personal loan. The minimum loan amount is $5,000 and a maximum loan amount of $50,000.

products.name: Personal Overdraft
products.description: Our variable rate revolving credit facility can be attached to selected transaction accounts. Visa debit cards can be linked to a Personal Overdraft
